title: Introducing: DAUNT
body:
Going to go straight out and say this – **DAUNT’s** debut track, This Body Rushes, could have been on Glass Animals 2014 record ZABA.

That’s not to say it’s not intoxicatingly brilliant, just at times, undeniably similar. As is often the case, there’s little information around about DAUNT, aside from the ‘mysterious’ artwork, and single track, _This Body Rushes_. Check it out below.
